unnormalised: Hey, great article on athlete biographies! Reminds me of watching "Chak De! India" back in college at IIT Delhi. I especially enjoy reading about folks like Mithali Raj and their struggles. It's inspiring seeing how they overcame challenges, training for hours in the heat in places like Rajasthan. What dedication! Wish there were more biographies of kabaddi players too, maybe someone from Pro Kabaddi League!
